content: What you are saying sounds about right, but I am not sure. I will fact-check later.
In my last project for the bootcamp I added a function called withAuth in the 'utils' folder just for that purpose.
And... you can do all that (plus plenty more) without knowing any cryptography!
I will hike here once a month beautiful serene
I am coming back tomorrow so many trails to explore
I will never go back AWEFUL TRAILS DON'T GO
